name: part_001
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】hololive 3rd Generation Live#きゅるるん大作戦〜最強アイドル、推すしかないでしょ〜【DAY2】 [XJJXk28ivwY]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: A slideshow featuring numerous fan messages and illustrations celebrating hololive 3rd Generation's 3rd live event.
Key visual for the live concert 'Kyururun Daisakusen' with all 3rd Generation members, notifying viewers that the show will start soon.
An attention screen for attendees providing guidance on stage effects and cheering rules.
A catalog showcase of the second round of concert-exclusive merchandise.
The key visual returns as the background music intensifies, signaling the imminent start of the performance.
A fan-contributed video montage featuring clips of fans dancing and celebrating, accompanied by the song 'Ai Ai Ai'.

subtitles.original:
開演までしばらくお待ちください
The concert will be starting soon
subtitles.english: The concert will be starting soon

subtitles.original:
Attention
ご来場のお客様へ
演出の都合上、照明の点滅にご注意ください
声出し応援OKです
subtitles.english:
Attention
To our visitors:
Please be aware of flashing lights due to stage effects.
Cheering loudly is OK!

開演までしばらくお待ちください

subtitles.english: The concert will be starting soon

subtitles.original:
たくさんの素敵なショート動画ありがとうございました！
ぜひ「あいあいあい」も楽しんでくださいね！
subtitles.english:
Thank you for so many wonderful short videos!
Please enjoy "Ai Ai Ai" as well!

subtitles.original: 大好き 大好き 大好き 大好き 大好き
subtitles.english: love, love, love, love, love so much!

subtitles.original: 溢れるこの愛 きっと止まらない
subtitles.english: This overflowing love surely won't stop!

subtitles.original: あいあいあい I love you
subtitles.english: Ai ai ai I love you!

subtitles.original: 君もあいあいあい I need you
subtitles.english: You too, ai ai ai I need you!
